name: MacFlex Core Dark Red
name_cn: 麦克福莱克斯胸甲 暗红色
description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Carrying Capacity: 9K µSCU
Temp. Rating: -37 / 67 °C
Backpack Compatibility: Light
Whether you're planetside or in vacuum, RSI's MacFlex industrial armor set has your back. Reinforced plating keeps you safe from environmental hazards while the array of pouches keep your tools accessible.
description_cn:

可挂载背包类型：轻型
无论您是在行星上还是在真空中，RSI的麦克福莱克斯工业装甲都能作为您强有力的后盾。增强型镀层使您免受环境的伤害，同时有大量的工具袋使您的工具易于取用。
